title: UCID: Urban Context Identifier
description: A standardized temporal identifier system and Python library for comprehensive urban context analysis across global cities. UCID provides a universal key for joining disparate urban datasets.
notes: This is the first stable release of UCID, featuring complete support for urban context analysis with 6 context types: 15MIN (15-Minute City), TRANSIT (Public Transit Quality), CLIMATE (Heat/Green Space), WALK (Walkability), VITALITY (Urban Diversity), and EQUITY (Accessibility Equity).
